original_text: The adversary hath spread out his hand upon all her pleasant things: for she hath seen that the heathen entered into her sanctuary, whom thou didst command that they should not enter into thy congregation.
korean_text: 대적이 손을 펴서 그의 모든 보물들을 빼앗았나이다 주께서 이미 이방인들을 막아 주의 성회에 들어오지 못하도록 명령하신 그 성소에 그들이 들어간 것을 예루살렘이 보았나이다

sentences.original_text: The adversary hath spread out his hand
that the heathen entered into her sanctuary
that they should not enter into thy congregation
